For anyone getting the Illegal pirate(stolen) warning pop-up: With Internet Security program this can be eradicated by adding the AvastUI.exe program line (from Avasts program folder) to the firewall application rules and selecting "Block all connections".Definition updating and program performance seem unaffected by this. It works for me - Try it!!! If you have Pro antivirus installed I don't know that it works.

Ok, so i've downloaded this torrent on my Windows Vista 64 bit Home edition and once i've followed the instruction (using the patch instead of the 700KB crack) i've realized that it does not work and in addition to not working, it freezes the computer everytime it starts (had to goto safe mode to delete the damn avast installation). I don't know about windows 7 or 8 but it seems more than likely that this does not work on Vista. Tried both Avast Antivirus Pro & Internet Security!

PS: Malwarebytes has identified the patch & crack to be PUP, which is obviously a false positive but it may cause instability while your trying to crack the program.
